item.title: China's Only Sons Impact on Army
item.description: China’s Only Sons Impact on Army China Has Significant Numbers, but Many of the Soldiers Are “only sons” and “only child” of Their Parents.

item.title: Cultural Appropriation
item.description: Cultural Appropriation Are we just salty that people are accepting? I feel like if I was to pick a world where people liked dumplings or didn’t , I would much rather have the first.

item.title: Jury Trials Make No Sense to Chinese People
item.description: Jury Trials Make No Sense to Chinese People What US Laws Make no sense to the Chinese? The big one I can think off hand is jury trials.

item.title: Legalism
item.description: Legalism Use a harsh code because it believed people are inherently evil. Was unsustainable because couldn’t keep loyalty. One general rebelled because he was late and so was sentenced to death, and decided he might as well rebel if he would die anyway.

item.title: Saving Face
item.description: Saving Face Morality is driven off representing your nation and status well, in contrast to more classical Western ideas that are more [[Deontology|Deontological]] and focus on your inner goodness/relationship with God.
